request.description: Use `contactNumbers.primary` instead of `phone`. To enable server perf timing set `DEBUG_PERF=1` when starting the server.
Required: provide `month` and `year` (we will create/find the payroll run). `gross`/`net` default to 0 if omitted. Attach file using key `file`. The response includes `month` and `year` fields.
Returns payroll run with status and fields: completedAt and errorLog (nullable)
Creates a statutory deduction. Send `rate` (number), e.g. 10 for 10%. The collection accepts `percentage` as an alias and will be mapped to `rate`.
Create a KPI. The `weight` value will be used by the performance generator when computing evaluation scores.

item.name: Update KPI
item.description: Modify a KPI; adjust weight to change its importance in automated scoring.

request.description: Manually trigger monthly performance generation (period YYYY-MM). This task is also executed automatically by a background job on schedule.
Department heads retrieve current (non-completed) tasks for their department. Admins may omit departmentId or pass a departmentId query param.
Attach a supporting document (PDF, Word .doc/.docx, or Excel .xls/.xlsx) up to 10MB using form key `attachment`.
